sections.heading: Inconsistent special acts repealed.
sections.text:
All special acts or provisions thereof inconsistent with this chapter and with sections 1-1a, 2-5, 2-40, 2-61, 5-164, 5-189, 7-80, 8-12, 9-63, 9-258, 9-368, 12-154, 14-141, 14-142, 18-65, 18-73, 19a-220, 21a-96, 29-13, 29-362, 30-105, 30-107, 30-111, 35-22, 46b-120, 46b-133, 46b-560, 47a-23, 47a-28, 47a-35, 47a-37, 49-61, 49-62, 51-6a, 51-9, 51-15, 51-27, 51-30, 51-33, 51-34, 51-36, 51-48, 51-49, 51-50, 51-51, 51-52, 51-59, 51-72, 51-73, 51-95, 51-183b, 51-183d, 51-183f, 51-183g, 51-215a, 51-229, 51-232, 51-237 and 51-241, subsection (a) of section 51-243 and sections 51-247, 51-347, 52-45a, 52-45b, 52-46, 52-97, 52-112, 52-139, 52-193, 52-194, 52-196, 52-209, 52-212, 52-215, 52-226, 52-240, 52-257, 52-258, 52-261, 52-263, 52-268, 52-270, 52-278i, 52-293, 52-297, 52-298, 52-324, 52-351, 52-397, 52-425, 52-427, 52-428, 52-521, 53-308, 53-328, 54-2a, 54-56f, 54-66, 54-72, 54-74, 54-82g, 54-82j, 54-82k, 54-95a, 54-96a, 54-96b, 54-97, 54-108, 54-154, 54-166 and 54-169 to 54-174, inclusive, are repealed.

(1959, P.A. 28, S. 213; P.A. 83-581, S. 33, 40; June Sp. Sess. P.A. 83-5, S. 16, 18; P.A. 84-393, S. 17, 18, 20; 84-546, S. 113, 173; P.A. 85-613, S. 107, 154; P.A. 89-174, S. 5, 7; P.A. 03-176, S. 2; P.A. 11-150, S. 15; P.A. 23-46, S. 43.)

History: P.A. 83-581 deleted reference to repealed Secs. 52-347, 52-361 and 52-371; June Sp. Sess. P.A. 83-5, effective July 1, 1985, and applicable to summoning of jurors for jury duty on and after September 1, 1986, deleted reference to Sec. 51-223; P.A. 84-393 repealed June Sp. Sess. P.A. 83-5 and, effective September 1, 1986, deleted reference to Sec. 51-223; P.A. 84-546 deleted reference to Sec. 54-70; P.A. 85-613 made technical changes, updating list of cited sections; P.A. 89-174 deleted reference to Sec. 52-49, which was repealed by the same act; (Revisor's note: In 1993 obsolete reference to repealed Sec. 52-291 was deleted editorially by the Revisors); P.A. 03-176 made technical changes, effective June 26, 2003; P.A. 11-150 deleted reference to repealed Sec. 3-84, effective July 8, 2011; P.A. 23-46 deleted reference to repealed Sec. 51-78, effective June 13, 2023.
